tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dear Dr. Gawai,
I could never put into words or fully express my gratitude to you for the quality of treatment that we received from you.

I was visited your clinic to treat my father’s shoulder problem. I was scared and nervous when you suggested a surgery for the issue. Which I think is common reaction when we heard the word “Surgery”. 
You build the confidence and complete trust from the pre-entrance testing to post-surgery.

I was impressed with the professionalism *** ***** **** ***** *** ********* *** ********** We were all accomplished by very professional, caring staff members. I have never had such a great experience with a medical team.

You and your staff should all be very proud of the service and care you provide to those of us that have parts of our bodies that just wear out!!  

You are a fantastic physician/surgeon, a wonderful person and you have a gift for making your patients really feel important & cared about. 
I will continue referring you to everyone I know.

I am forever grateful to you.
-- Ravindra  Malkasare

tags: None
review: Good first experience   Has lot of experience looking forward to safe and right diagnosis and treatment

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I visited Dr Gawai for my recurring shoulder dislocation problem. This time was different, I was in an accident and also had a greater tuberosity fracture. Doc listened to the problem properly and guided me really well and explained my situation throughly. We decided to go ahead and do a surgery for the fracture and the bankart repair. After listening to stories from other friends who went through the same process and the pain involved, I was very sceptical. The surgery went very smoothly, literally no pain involved. From day 1 of the surgery, Dr Yajuvendra Gawai gave me excerises so that I wouldn't get a frozen shoulder which really boosted my confidence. The healing process has been smooth so far. I would recommend anyone to him!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Analyses well and gives practical solution.  Didn’t have to wait so that’s a huge bonus considering the Mumbai traffic.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,
review: I had extreme pain in my left shoulder. Doctor Gawai diagnosed the problem ********* *** ********** *********** ********* ***** relieved me from the pain and also suggested physiotherapy and exercises which also helped a lot. Would definitely recommend him

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Doctor friendliness,
review: I had taken my mom to Dr. Gawai. Initially she was very scared to even go to the doctor. But after meeting the good doc she was at peace and relaxed which i feel is the biggest thing. My mom was very happy with the way Dr. Gawai explained all the details and in a language which made her comfortable. Thanks a lot Doc.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr. Gawai is a fine *** ************* doctor. 

 I was under tremendous stress and pain. He patiently listened and understood my ailment, and then systematically addressed it by prescribing a combination of meds and physiotherapy which worked wonders.

Overall, I have had an excellent experience with Dr. Gawai and would highly recommend him to anyone with spine/ back issues without any doubt!

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Value for money,Wait time,
review: ** ********** ***** ** *** **** ********** ******* ** **** ******my mother - in - law had complaint of severe knee joint pain for years....it  has reduced  now with Dr Gawai's  treatment.....My mother- in - law is very happy with the results...but more importantly he was very honest in his approach towards treatment and explained everything very nicely..... thanks Dr Gawai.... you Rock!!!! Keep the good work going !!!!!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: My dad being a senior citizen. He is around 75. He had this chronic shoulder pain problem. Dr.Gawai not only treated the ailment but was very cordial and patient with my dad. He answered all his queries and was very respectful. The ailment can be treated with medicines but a senior citizen needs reassurance and "dont worry everything will be fine vibe" which dr.gawai extended. The clinic itself has a positive aura and dr.yajuvendra thank you so much for the positivity you passed on to my dad.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Normally when we meet first time any new Dr we expect understanding / listening to our problem patiently, Which Dr Yajuvendra was very good at it. He made me feel very comfortable. Which itself made me feel relax. His diagnose was very good. I had my  bad shoulder issue since long time as I do lot of sports activity. After visiting him couple of times I am now completely fit back to normal doing my regular stuff. Thanks ones again for you kind and friendly approach..

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,
review: I had extreme pain in my heels since a month or so. When I visited Dr. Gawai, he was very polite and made his patients feel extremely comfortable. He suggested the shockwave treatment and even prescribed medicines. His treatment has really helped me a lot. Would definitely recommend him to everyone.

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review: Visited Dr Yajuvendra Gawai at his clinic in Santacruz (W) on 6th & 13th June 22 for heavy swelling in knee. Biggest attribute of Dr Yajuvendra is that he instantly instills a very positive feeling in the patient. Will suggest surgery only when truly required(unlike most Drs in private hospitals). Being young and fitness conscious, he is always keen that his patients enjoy an active life. His pleasing demeanour just adds to the “feel good” factor of the patients. Stay blessed Dr.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Doctor Gawai is my Go-to doctor for all my and my family’s orthopaedic  advice. As a consultant he is perceptive , intuitive and practical. He explains the condition  and gives directions with next steps. He is cordial and takes a keen interest in the patient.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Doctor Gawai is very calm, ensures patient feels comfortable. He doesn't gives unnecessary heavy medications, doesn't suggests endless list of reports.I visited him for hip pain, he was able to diagnose and provide correct medication. my pain started fading away next day itself and was able to stand and walk second day. Doctor did suggest basic tests as well to counter the root cause and provided good information on cause.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I suffered an ankle fracture while playing cricket in February 2018. Dr Gawai was frank and pragmatic in his approach. 
He clearly explained to me the pros and cons of getting an ORIF surgery done. He also informed me of the expected timeline for recovery.
During the course of recovery he was always available for consultation at Nanavati Hospital as well as over the phone. 
Overall , a pleasant experience.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,
review: He is good and Had excellent experience with doctor consultation gives efficient time to patient thank You so much doctor

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I am software professional and  sitting in an office chair for prolonged periods of time caused lower back pain. The pain worsened and i was unable to walk even 100 meters without halting.  I approached Doctor Yajuvendra , he was able to immediately diagnose the problem. He suggested physio therapy and some medicine as my Vitamin D was also very low. After following Dr. Yajuvendra 's advice the pain has gone  and now i am fit and able walk more than 6km without any pain. I would strongly recommend Dr. Yajuvendra for any kind of sports injury , joint pains , back pain etc.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr. Gawai was very patient in listening to me. I started running at the age of 39 and within a year developed severe pain in my left heel that I could not even walk. A friend recommended Dr. Gawai and I feared surgery. But Dr. Gawai did a thorough evaluation and started a very conservative treatment that I was comfortable with. Two weeks of physiotherapy later I was running again.

I loved the entire experience and got my 65 year old mother for visits when she fell and fractured her wrist. She appreciated Dr. Gawai's patience and his willingness to describe the entire process in two languages.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I was not happy with the way doctor treated. He gave me time for 630pm then came at 645pm  and had a patient. After I discussed my issue with him which was ankle pain- he did not even press and feel where the pain is or what the issue is. He just looked at it and gave ***** treatment with rest for 2 weeks. I paid 1200rs to get a consultation. He did not even give exercise to release pain nor did he recommend any different shoes. He said I should rest but I am okay to drive when I got hurt doing the same thing.

review: Dr. Gawai was referred to me by a friend. I was suffering from pain in my right shoulder for a few months and was yet to seek any expert diagnosis. Dr. Gawai not only spent a good deal of time trying to understand the issue but also recommended a good Physiotherapist to help me recover. He keeps a regular tab on my development and is always there to guide.  I am already in the recovery mode but the personal touch make all the difference. I will recommend Dr. Gawai for all such issues.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review:
Dr Yajuvendra Gavai is a highly qualified Orthopaedic Surgeon who has worked and studied in the best Orthopaedic centers in the world .I had gone to him for my chronic shoulder pain.He took no time to diagnose the exact issue with just minimal investigations.He suggested me a definite plan of treatment and explained it to me so well.
Now after one month of his suggested treatment my shoulder is pain free and i can perform my daily activities with confort.
5 Stars
